body.name: Glorto Radeon HD 5450 1GB DDR3 Low Profile Graphics Card, PCI Express 2.0 x16, HDMI/VGA/DVI, Entry Level GPU for PC, SFF and HTPC
features: Powered by AMD Radeon HD 5450, 40nm chipset process with 625MHz core frequency
Integrated with 1024MB DDR3 memory and 64-bit bus width
HDMI / VGA / DVI 3 ports output available. HDMI Max Resolution-2560x1600, VGA Max Resolution-2048x1536, DVI Max Resolution-2560x1600
Support DirectX 11, OpenGL 4.5, ATI Eyefinity and ATI Stream
Original half height bracket matches with the low profile brackets make the Glorto Radeon HD 5450 graphics card fit well with all PC tower, small form factor and HTPC(except micro form factor)
body.description: AMD Radeon HD 5450 1GB DDR3 64 Bit PCI Express 2.0 x 16 Low Profile Video Card Budget low-end graphics card for home office and video entertainment With 1024MB of memory capacity, this graphics card can meet the demands of home entertainment, light gaming, and office tasks. Include DVI, VGA, and HDMI interfaces, making the video card easy to connect different types of displays. The DVI interface is suitable for digital signals, while the VGA interface is suitable for analog signals, and the HDMI interface supports high-definition video transmission.Features a half-height low-profile design, making it compatible with various computer cases, especially SFF tower match with the included brackets.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.0 4.0 out of 5 stars 10 ratings 4.0 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Glorto Radeon HD 5450 Graphics Card offers the most functionality in its class with complete DirectX 11 support and advanced graphics, display features and technologies. Designed to deliver a feature laden gaming/computing experience, Radeon HD 5450 enables a seamless HD gaming experience with amazing image quality. At the heart of the entertainment experience on the PC, things like video playback, editing and transferring content to portable media players are now fast and easy. Supports Windows 7, Windows 10, and future DirectX11 games giving users incredible system performance in an energy efficient card that is easy to install with no external power supply needed.

AMD Radeon HD 5450 1GB DDR3 64 Bit PCI Express 2.0 x 16 Low Profile Video Card Budget low-end graphics card for home office and video entertainment With 1024MB of memory capacity, this graphics card can meet the demands of home entertainment, light gaming, and office tasks. Include DVI, VGA, and HDMI interfaces, making the video card easy to connect different types of displays. The DVI interface is suitable for digital signals, while the VGA interface is suitable for analog signals, and the HDMI interface supports high-definition video transmission.Features a half-height low-profile design, making it compatible with various computer cases, especially SFF tower match with the included brackets. What You Will Get: Glorto Radeon HD 5450 1GB Graphics Card x1 Low Profile Brackets x2
What Glorto Radeon HD 5450 Can Do: Dual Screen Display Picture&Video Editing Office Working

Specification GPU Name Caicos Memory Format 1GB DDR3 64 bits Ports HDMI / DVI / VGA CUDA Core 160 GPU Clock 625 MHz Memory Clock 533 MHz Subvendor ATI AIB Slot PCI Express x16 2.0 DirectX Support DirectX 11.0 Maximum Digital Resolution 2560x1600 Computing OpenCL/ DirectCompute Technologies OpenGL 4.5

Troubleshooting Tips The following troubleshooting tips may help if you experience problems. Contact GLORTO for more advanced troubleshooting information. Check that the card is seated properly in the PCI Express slot.Ensure that the display cable is securely fastened to the card's display connector.Make sure that the monitor and computer are plugged in and receiving power.If necessary, disable any built-in graphics capabilities on your motherboard. For more information, consult your computer's manual or manufacturer. (NOTE: Some manufacturers do not allow the built-in graphics to be disabled or to become the secondary display.)Make sure you selected the appropriate display device and graphics card when you install the graphics driver.Restart your computer. Press on your keyboard after system starts up. When the Windows Advanced Options Menu appears, select Safe Mode and press . After getting into Safe Mode, in Device Manager check whether the driver for the graphics card is correct.If you are not able to find the desired monitor color/resolution settings: The color and screen resolution options available for selection depend on the graphics card being installed. If necessary, adjust your monitor's setting using monitor's adjust panel to make the screen look focused, crisp, and sharp. (Please refer to the monitor's manual.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well packaged and easy install into DELL OPTIPLEX. Just what I needed to run CURA and Autodesk Fusion 360. Price was right and performance has exceeded my hopes.
